call_summary.final_outcome: The receptionist identified the caller as an existing client and attempted to locate the requested staff member. Upon finding the staff member unavailable, the receptionist offered a transfer to his voicemail, which the caller accepted, and the transfer was initiated.

transfer_context.description: The receptionist offered to transfer the caller to the staff member's voicemail after stating he was on another call. The caller accepted and the receptionist initiated the transfer path.
